text: Flavio Cipolla and Goran Tošić are the defending champions, but did not participate. Mikhail Elgin and Igor Zelenay won the title, defeating Andrea Arnaboldi and Matteo Viola in the final, 6–3, 6–3. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ==References== * Main Draw Kazan Kremlin Cup - Doubles Category:Kazan Kremlin Cup Category:2015 in Russian sport
title: 2015 Kazan Kremlin Cup – Doubles
